section_title: 22g25. Deductions from salaries of physicians, lawyers and teachers.
text:
Deductions
from the salary of an employee who works in a position that is not subject to  the
salary basis requirement for the 29 U.S.C. § 213(a)(1) exemption will not
defeat the exemption. WHD
Letter FLSA 2005-16NA WHD
Letter FLSA 2005-34NA
html:
Deductions from the salary of an employee who works in a position that is not subject to  the salary basis requirement for the 29 U.S.C. § 213(a)(1) exemption will not defeat the exemption.

WHD Letter FLSA 2005-16NA

WHD Letter FLSA 2005-34NA
